body: This spell functions like protection from evil, except that the deflection and resistance bonuses apply to attacks made by good creatures. The target receives a new saving throw against control by good creatures and good summoned creatures cannot touch the target.
description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignments.
level_text: Adept: 1; Antipaladin: 1; Arcanist: 1; Bloodrager: 1; Cleric: 1; Inquisitor: 1; Oracle: 1; Shaman: 1; Sorcerer: 1; Summoner: 1; Warpriest: 1; Wizard: 1
name: Protection From Good
